mapper.sql: menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, href, component, perms, icon, `type`, order_num, create_time, modify_time
mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, `href`, component, perms, icon, `type`, order_num, create_time, modify_time FROM tb_menu m WHERE m.type = '0' AND m.menu_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT mr.menu_id FROM tb_menu_role mr LEFT JOIN tb_role r ON (mr.role_id = r.role_id) LEFT JOIN tb_role_user ur ON (ur.role_id = r.role_id) LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON (u.user_id = ur.user_id) WHERE u.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ORDER BY m.order_num

SELECT m.perms FROM tb_role r LEFT JOIN tb_role_user ru ON (r.role_id = ru.role_id) LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON (u.user_id = ru.user_id) LEFT JOIN tb_menu_role mr ON (mr.role_id = r.role_id) LEFT JOIN tb_menu m ON (m.menu_id = mr.menu_id) WHERE u.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND m.perms IS NOT NULL AND m.perms != ''
